title: The Latest Push for Gun Control & More Gaffes from Joe Biden | Bill Hader
itunes:title: The Latest Push for Gun Control & More Gaffes from Joe Biden | Bill Hader
description:
Jaboukie Young-White pitches a novel way to solve America's gun problem, Trevor examines Joe Biden's latest gaffes, and Bill Hader talks about "Barry" and "IT Chapter Two."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
